content.prompt: Which of the following is a prediction that could be made about the activity of the ratsâ€™ brains when exposed to the stimulant?

choices.label: The MRI will show more greens and yellows when exposed to the stimulants.
The MRI will show more blues and grays when exposed to the stimulant.
The MRI will show no difference in neural activity.
The MRI should show more oranges and reds when exposed to the stimulant.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
